sentences.en: Cotton burnt - out fabric was manufactured by burnt - out process combined with foam printing and elastic mucilage printing.
sentences.cn: 纯棉织物烂花产品经烂花工艺实现布面空洞,而以发泡印花工艺和弹性胶浆印花工艺锁边,防止脱纱或脱絮现象.

sentences.en: Full - sealed structure can be used in the screening of powder, granule and mucilage.
sentences.cn: 全密封结构可用于筛选粉, 颗粒剂和粘胶.

sentences.en: Hige efficiency refined design, duration, any powders and mucilage are suitable for using.
sentences.cn: 效率高、设计精巧耐用, 任何粉类、粘液均可筛分.

sentences.en: Lidocaine hydrochloride mucilage is a kind of lubricant and surface anaesthetic.
sentences.cn: 盐酸利多卡因胶浆是一种润滑剂及表面麻醉剂.

sentences.en: Objective : To introduce the preparation and quality control of tetracaine hydrochloride glycerin mucilage.
sentences.cn: 目的: 介绍盐酸丁卡因甘油胶浆的制备及质量控制.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the effects of meglumine diatrizoate mucilage ( MDC ) used as contrast medium in bronchography.
sentences.cn: 目的评价泛影葡胺胶浆造影剂对支气管 造影 的显影效果.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the toxicological status of using shoes mucilage and solvent in Fujian province.
sentences.cn: 目的了解福建省使用的鞋用胶水和溶剂的毒性状况.

sentences.en: Results The LD 50 of diclofenac mucilage ( contained in enema for mice ) was 399.
sentences.cn: 结果小鼠双氯芬酸钠胶浆直肠注药半数致死量 ( LD50 ) 为399.

sentences.en: They tested two types of mucilage — a gelatinous substance produced by the cactus — in contaminated water.
sentences.cn: 他们在被污染的水中测试了两种粘液——仙人掌分泌的胶状物质。

sentences.en: When the trap door shuts, the plant excretes mucilage next to a special cuticle around the door, creating a watertight seal.
sentences.cn: 当陷阱阀门关闭的时候，植物在阀门周围的特殊角质层上分泌粘液，形成不透水密封垫。

words.tran_cn: 粘的，[植] 粘液质的；分泌粘液的
